extendedInfo.description: USA/Canada only!Mobile Fax turns your phone into a fax machine!  Use the camera to scan a page and the phone will send it (free) to any fax number in USA/Canada!This full version includes free faxing of up to 9 pages per day!  More sending available with an account if necessary.In association with GotFreeFax.com.

reviews.comment: First off when u goto fax u can\'t because it does not give u the option to choose a pdf or a ms doc so the app will not let u fax. U r stealing money
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mobile fax
reviews.comment: I paid the 6.40 for the 9 faxes a day and they only let me fax 2 pages and when I tried to fax more an error said I went over my daily limit! This is a scam! Fake don\'t bother
reviews.author: Steven Bennett

reviews.title: Need refund
reviews.comment: Bought the full version. Only sent 1 fax and it says daily limit reached. Annoying! How do I get a refund??
reviews.author: mike tane

reviews.comment: Can\'t send any word or excell spread sheets, Do not buy this, personally I wouldn\'t have purchased it if I had known sooner how limited it truly is.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pay 6.95 for full version and it only let\'s you send two pages per day. What a rip off. Full version should allow more than 2.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worked great
reviews.comment: Had to send an emergency medical release in the middle of the night. No fax machine available. Downloaded app and fax sent in just a couple minutes. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is a scam.
reviews.comment: I paid for the full version of this app, yet I can only send 1 fax page before it tells me I\'m  over the limit. What a scam. Don\'t waste your money!
reviews.author: Misti Keith

reviews.comment: It does not work at all and its false advertising about this so called 9 pages per day refund my money thanks and unistalled it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: For the record, this app DOES work.
reviews.comment: It works quite well in fact. The problem is you can\'t see anything when you are scanning in documents, so you have to \"guess\" where the camera is aiming. Just press \"Scan\" and you\'ll see your document perfect and ready to fax. It takes a few tries to get it right, but it does work. It\'s a pain, but whatever. :P (Samsung Fascinate)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great every time. 5 stars for sure!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This a great application. This is an application to use your hand held as a fax machine,but not neccesarily a complete fax service. Give it a chance.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rip-off
reviews.comment: Evil people create evil scams such as this one to steal honest people\'s hard earned money.  Of course, I am sure there is no chance of a refund, so the best that I can hope is that whoever created this horrible app goes to hell.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxi S III
reviews.comment: It works well. the only thing I dont like is you can only scan dokument and fax it. You can\'t fax the existing document from your sd card. May be you can but I didnt find the option to do so.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No Good!
reviews.comment: Trying to get a refund and can\'t it asked you to enter in a code then when you do it does it again and again! All I get is a Black page printed out! Dont bother, would like a  refund!
reviews.author: Wade Curtis

reviews.title: Unreliable App & company
reviews.comment: Paid for full version and still limited to free version guidelines. Refund button don\'t even show up to get your money back. Total scam
reviews.author: Robert Baving

reviews.comment: Fax too dark to send, need to integrate camera flash. Contacted developer, said to adjust, adjusted didn\'t work either, app is useless. Evo4g
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Can\'t get my FAX to go through. Keeps saying there\'s an eror
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Blurry
reviews.comment: Works but the photos are always kinda black.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work as promised
reviews.comment: Please refund my money as I paid for the full version and was still limited to the same as the free version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sucks.keeps saying needs name.error 101. But no explanation anywhere.scanR worked perfect first time & free
reviews.author: A Google User
